# Chain Dispel (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]], [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 15]], [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** One or more creatures, no two of which are more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 105

*A coruscating bolt rips through the air, humming with power as it strikes each targeted creature.*

Each creature struck by this spell is affected as if by a targeted *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*, except that you can add your caster level to the dispel check, up to a maximum of 25.

*Material Component:* A pair of bronze nails, each no less than 6 inches in length.
